name: Monofilament Line
description: Monofilament is a forgiving, all-purpose line that offers stretch, ease of use, and affordability.
purpose: Great for topwater, reaction baits, and beginners learning line management.
pros: Great for topwater lures due to buoyancy
techniques: Use for topwater or beginner setups
Avoid use in heavy structure or rocks
whisper: The mono is forgiving — a teacher of rhythm and resilience. It stretches, but does not snap.
